title: AI Adoption Strategy Design Workshop for Higher Education Administrators

context.prior_knowledge: Core Educational Technology Concepts and Organizational Management Experience
context.additional_context: Practical skills-focused program for corporate language education managers/leaders

learning_goals: Develop AI adoption strategies utilizing core Technology Acceptance Model (TAM) elements (perceived usefulness, ease of use).
Analyze operational scenarios of AI-based language learning systems in VR simulation environments and propose improvements.
Project-based assessment enables the identification of barriers to AI adoption and the development of an implementation roadmap.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
